name: Whisper Beneath the Waves
desc: You discover a strange tree at the Eye of Kratti...

customize.text: Properties

<color=#ffffff>Unlock Requirements</color>
Enter a hole at the east coast of <color=#ece5d8>Eye of Kratti</color> .
<color=#ffffff>Quest Chain</color>
World Quest Series:

customize.name: East of the Moon, West of the Sun
customize.desc: Meet various people around Nod-Krai, in search of Proofs of the Cognoscenti.

customize.name: The Shoemaker's Children Go Barefoot
customize.desc: The massive facility on Paha Isle seems to hide many secrets...

customize.name: The Tale-Telling Heart
customize.desc: A group of people, each with their own story to tell, lights a bonfire at Blue Amber Lake...

customize.name: Whisper Beneath the Waves
customize.desc: You discover a strange tree at the Eye of Kratti...

customize.text: <color=#ffffff>Rewards</color>

customize.name: Adventure EXP
customize.desc: Adventure EXP. Used to improve Adventure Rank.

customize.name: Primogem
customize.desc: A primordial crystalline gem that's beyond the mundane world. Shines with the condensed hopes and dreams of universes that once were.

customize.name: Mora
customize.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

customize.name: Hero's Wit
customize.desc:
Character EXP material. Gives 20000 EXP.
These experiences are extremely precious for a pilgrim traveling through Teyvat in order to be closer to Celestia.

customize.name: Mystic Enhancement Ore
customize.desc:
Weapon EXP material. Gives 10,000 EXP.
Legend has it that this refined ingot contains the memories of battles that had taken place in the land. The weapons that benefit from these memories naturally become sentient.

customize.name: Inscripta-Cognoscenti's Feather
customize.desc: A feather as dark as night. It is said to be a keepsake from Reed Miller, the founder of the Treasure Hoarders.

customize.text: Unlock Requirements

Enter a hole at the east coast of <color=#ece5d8>Eye of Kratti</color> .
<color=#ffffff>Location -</color> <color=#ece5d8>Eye of Kratti, Nod-Krai</color>
<color=#ffffff73>Teleport to the nearby waypoint and approach the quest location circled in red.</color>

<color=#ffffff73>The player will see some ghosts talk about a Proof of Cognoscenti near some debris with a red kuuvahki field on them.</color>
<color=#ffffff73>Use a nearby kuuvahki stone to destroy the debris, then enter the hole that was formed.</color>
<color=#ffffff73>Quest Objective:</color> <color=#ffffff73>Talk to Paimon</color>
<color=#ffffff73>Quest Objective:</color> <color=#ffffff73>Continue exploring</color>
<color=#ffffff73>Quest Objective:</color> <color=#ffffff73>Continue exploring the cave</color>

<color=#ffffff73>To start the quest, enter the hole.</color>
<color=#ffffff73>The player will see a ghost going further in.</color>
<color=#ffffff73>Kuuvahki can be utilized to open the path.</color>

<color=#ffffff73>In this quest, the player will come across some points of interest which the player must touch.</color>
<color=#ffffff73>From them will emerge creatures that will help the player progress.</color>
<color=#ffffff73>Take the nearby Kuuvahki Dewdrop and energize the gate to open a path.</color>

<color=#ffffff73>Here, the player must take the nearby Kuuvahki Dewdrop forward.</color>
<color=#ffffff73>Do not touch the kuuvahki energy fields or the Kuuvahki Dewdrop will be sent back.</color>

<color=#ffffff73>Reaching the gate, use the Kuuvahki Dewdrop to open it.</color>
<color=#ffffff73>Quest Objective:</color> <color=#ffffff73>Talk to Paimon</color>
<color=#ffffff73>Quest Objective:</color> <color=#ffffff73>Find a way to collect Kuuvahki Dewdrops and throw them into the central energy field</color>

<color=#ffffff73>Use the Moonlanes to navigate the area.</color>
<color=#ffffff73>The Kuuvahki Dewdrops will form in each of the three pillars present here.</color>

<color=#ffffff73>In order to progress, touch the same types of point of interest seen earlier.</color>
<color=#ffffff73>Creatures will emerge from them, and once a sufficient number has been joined in one of the three pillars, they will form a Kuuvahki Dewdrop.</color>

<color=#ffffff73>The central energy field must be fed three Kuuvahki Dewdrops in order to progress the quest.</color>
<color=#ffffff73>Quest Objective:</color> <color=#ffffff73>Return to the surface</color>
<color=#ffffff73>Quest Objective:</color> <color=#ffffff73>Talk to Ilmari</color>

<color=#ffffff73>Returning to the surface, interact with the Exquisite Chest in the middle of the water to progress.</color>
<color=#ffffff73>The player will receive the</color>

customize.name: Inscripta-Cognoscenti's Feather
customize.desc: A feather as dark as night. It is said to be a keepsake from Reed Miller, the founder of the Treasure Hoarders.

customize.text:
<color=#ffffff73>.</color>
<color=#ffffff73>Afterwards, the player will enter a dialogue section with Ilmari, before finishing the quest.</color>
<color=#ffffff73>The player will receive "Fiddlerâ€™s Green" achievement after completing this quest.</color>
<color=#ffd780>Achievement Category - Wonders of the World</color>
<color=#ffffff>Fiddlerâ€™s Green</color>
When all returns to peace...

customize.name: Primogem
customize.desc: A primordial crystalline gem that's beyond the mundane world. Shines with the condensed hopes and dreams of universes that once were.
